title.value: Теоретическое обоснование мощности электропривода вальцовой плющилки-измельчителя
The theoretical justification of the electric power of roller crushing machine
The theoretical justification of the electric power of roller crushing machine

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Vorobev, N.A., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Application of grain crushing equipment directly for grain crushing along with its use as cutting machine allows increasing of loading time simultaneously raising application efficiency. But complicating of the grain crushing process leads to equal increase of energy consumption. Therefore, development of high-productive rolling grain crushing machine, equipped with powerful electric drive and combining functions of crushing and rolling of the grain, appears a serious problem of mechanical engineering The results of theoretical investigations of rolling power of grain crushing machine of different constructions are given. Dependences for the calculation of power of crushing machine with various force of speed and diameter of rolling presses, interstice and inclination of surface is found. Correlation of power based on rolling, rotating with various speed has been analyzed.
